title: Gazing Into the Eternal
description: From the back cover of Belzebuub's Gazing into the Eternal: Within you lies a latent potential far greater than you realize. Your life is the most precious of gifts; it is an opportunity to find inner peace, a pathway to explore the spiritual, and a tool to probe the deepest mysteries of life and death. From the cause of suffering and the dire state of our world, to overcoming negativity and achieving spiritual awakening, Belzebuub answers some of the deepest questions we face to reveal the existence of Gnosis, the knowledge of the heart and how spirituality is an objective, personal search. Gain profound insight into lifeâ€™s higher purpose and how to explore key spiritual mysteries with the tangible goal of attaining permanent happiness and inner peace.
author: Belzebuub
